title: Global Macro, Currencies, and Bitcoin with James Lavish
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente speaks with ex-Hedge Fund Manager James Lavish to discuss Bitcoin, currencies, and BTC's role in the current macro landscape.   

Follow James at: twitter.com/JamesLavish
